adv: It allows you to view the relationships between different variables concerning a topic. It is easy to understand, clear, color-coded and effective. The tool creates the visualizations for you quickly, so you do not have to spend time mapping it out yourself.
disadv: You can only view up to three factors at once, the circle sizes are limited and basic when viewing three variables and sometimes it is difficult to view a trend when there is a lot of information because you have to scroll down. It would be better if the views got wider and the font got smaller, instead of longer.
